name: Html2markdown
body: ### Simple html to Markdown ruby gem We love markdown, cause it is friendly to edit. So we want everything to be **markdown** ### RSpec is our promise ```ruby p = HTMLPage.new :contents => 'haha' p.markdown.should == '**haha**' p.contents = 'hehe' p.markdown!.should == '**hehe**' # you can also define your own node parse p.strong do |node,contents| "strong text : **#{contents}**" end p.markdown!.should be_include('strong text') ``` ### Installation * gem ```ruby gem install html2markdown ``` * Rails Gemfile ```ruby gem 'html2markdown' ```
tagline: simple and flexible html to markdown converter
